column5: Hey guys,  Never introduced myself properly, as you can tell, my name is Chris and I've been fishing pretty much all my life. Always followed the site, but never actually contributed so I thought I would start.  Hit the grand yesterday (York Area), and caught a bunch OOS bass and this pretty big Drummie which hit right on shore. It was also good to see a CO officer checking licenses which was a first for me in that area. One guy got a ticket for something but not sure for what.
